pelapatha mawage piya - sumali raja mawa - pushpothkata kumariya piyage piya - pulasthi isiwaraya piya - waishrawa isiwaraya birinda - mandodari kumariya putha - meghanada hewath indrajith soyuran - weshana,kumbhakarna , wibhishana , karan saha dushanan (niwun) soyuriya - suparnaka mamandiya - kalanemi isiwaraya rawana rajuye rajya dhurawaliya gana adhyayanaya karana wita polonnaruwe sitiya yayi kiyana maha rushi pulasthige wadi mahalu putha wana wesamuni ho waishrawanage putha, enam pulathisi rushiwarayage munupura wu kuwera yi.
